feed.title: Category: Sinatra, | Will C. Fisher, Jr.

entry.title: First Freelancing Job!
entry.content:
I am extremely excited to begin working on a project for my friend, Eric Daubert. Eric is a multitalented musician who brings an engaging stage presence and virtuosic merry-making to your favorite watering hole.

My plans for his site include:

  • Sinatra server
  • Google Calendar sync (ensuring pain-free updates)
  • Twitter Stream (Still need to register Eric)
  • Collection of Links to friends/colleagues
  • Gallery of work
  • Mailing List

Hopefully, we’ll be up and running by the end of the week.
